adDetails: Education is changing a lot right now and the expectations on your child are increasing! I can help your child catch up/keep up/get ahead with his or her learning. I am a Berkeley-educated credentialed Special Education teacher teaching in a public school, working with students with many different skill levels in grades K-6. I have taught in a variety of settings with a total of 10 years of teaching experience. The subjects I can tutor your child in include phonics/decoding, reading comprehension, written expression, number sense, math reasoning, and study skills. I have several years of experience in designing educational programs to meet my students' individual learning needs. Every child learns differently and I believe the key to success in education for students is feeling confident and positive about their learning! Please contact me for availability, in your email include -your name -a good time to contact you and your phone number -your child's name, grade, and area(s) of need
